author: William Worrall
title: Coronavirus Isolation? Minecraft is Your Jam, Not Call of Duty Warzone
description: Minecraft is a perfect game to help you survive coronavirus isolation. Even more so than online games like Call of Duty Warzone. The post Coronavirus Isolation? Minecraft is Your Jam, Not Call of Duty Warzone appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Gaming is more important than ever right now as people try to stay sane during coronavirus isolation.
  • While many are playing Call of Duty Warzone, Minecraft is much better suited to the current situation.
